title: About ZapAround
subtitle: We're revolutionizing the way people plan their travels with assistant-powered recommendations and real-time updates.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.paragraph1: ZapAround was born from the shared passion of two travel enthusiasts from Canada. After experiencing the frustrations of traditional travel planning, we decided to create a solution that would make the process more enjoyable and efficient.
ourStory.paragraph2: As avid travelers ourselves, we understand the challenges of coordinating trips, finding the best destinations, and staying on top of changing conditions. We've put our hearts into developing ZapAround, leveraging our combined experience in technology and travel to build a platform we truly believe in.
ourStory.paragraph3: Every feature in ZapAround has been carefully designed with travelers in mind, reflecting our commitment to creating a tool we would want to use ourselves. This isn't just a business for usâ€”it's a labor of love, built by travelers, for travelers.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To make travel planning seamless and enjoyable, helping travelers discover the perfect destinations and create unforgettable experiences. We believe that planning should be part of the joy of travel, not a source of stress.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the world's most trusted travel companion, leveraging technology to enhance the joy of exploration and adventure. We see a future where every traveler has the tools they need to plan their perfect journey with confidence.

value1.title: Passion for Travel
value1.description: We're travelers first, developers second. Everything we build is inspired by our own journeys and experiences.

value2.title: User-Centered Design
value2.description: We put travelers at the heart of every feature, focusing on what makes planning easier and more enjoyable.

value3.title: Continuous Improvement
value3.description: We're constantly learning, iterating, and improving based on traveler feedback and industry trends.

value4.title: Building Community
value4.description: We believe in the power of shared experiences and the wisdom of fellow travelers.

feature1.title: Assistant-Powered Planning
feature1.description: Get personalized recommendations based on your preferences and travel style.

feature2.title: Real-Time Updates
feature2.description: Stay informed with live weather updates and local recommendations.

feature3.title: Community Driven
feature3.description: Join a community of passionate travelers sharing their experiences.

joinUs.title: Join Us On This Journey
joinUs.description: We're just getting started, and we're excited to have you along for the ride. Whether you're planning your next weekend getaway or a round-the-world adventure, ZapAround is here to make your travel dreams a reality.
